about_me.des: Après une licence en Economie et Gestion à l'Université d'Angers je suis fortement intéressé par un Master en Econométrie et/ou Data Science. J'aime l'analyse statistique et la programmation en R et Python. Dans mon temps libre je réalise des projets d'analyse de données et d'économétrie.

projects.jalpc: This project is my project. I use javescript to get repo's information all my repos have only one request.
projects.cpython: This project is other's project. I use another request to get repo's information.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
